title: Google\Cloud\ContactCenterInsights\V1\AnnotationBoundary
name: AnnotationBoundary
description:
A point in a conversation that marks the start or the end of an annotation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.contactcenterinsights.v1.AnnotationBoundary

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.word_index
params.description: The word index of this boundary with respect to the first word in the transcript piece. This index starts at zero.

params.name: data.transcript_index
params.description: The index in the sequence of transcribed pieces of the conversation where the boundary is located. This index starts at zero.
